thread.title: DanielCordova

author: DanielCordova
title: DanielCordova
text:
Pomonas Mo. Avas made a nice gesture regarding my friends "Get Well" floral delivery by contacting a family member and getting her Hospital info and cheering my friend up, while she was still there.
She was especially tickled by the attractive floral assortment and stuffed dog toy. I was pleased how everything worked out,It was my original hope for her to get it in the hospital, that more than what I would have gotten in Chicago. Instead of leaving everything on her porch susceptible to cold and wildlife.
